title: A Dangerous life
creator_credit: R. Markowitz, Hal McElroy and McElroy & McElroy
brief_description: Tells the story of the four day revolution in the Philippines. Told through the eyes of a television reporter and photojournalist, it backgrounds the struggle that led to the 1986 revolution which saw Aquino become president succeeding the ousted Ferdinand Marcos.
creator_credit_for_label: R. Markowitz, Hal McElroy and McElroy & McElroy
